desc: Sadhana Beads is gemstone jewelry to be held in the hand and in the heart. Our creations include custom necklaces, earrings, anklets and bracelets. All is handcrafted with brass or stainless, framing stones like Aventurine, Chalcedony, Tiger's Eye, Garnet, Jade, Carnelian, Quartz, Amethyst, Onyx, Lapis Lazuli and more.
